price: And they will say, “If only we had listened or understood, we would not be among the dwellers of the Blazing Fire.”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
